body_html:
@kevinlu1211 I'm not familiar with MacOS but it looks like one of the following is the problem:

  1. openmpi is not installed on your machine
  2. openmpi is not in your library path
  3. mpi_cxx is called something else on MacOS (on my machine there is a file called libmpi_cxx.so)
body_text:
@kevinlu1211 I'm not familiar with MacOS but it looks like one of the following is the problem:

openmpi is not installed on your machine
openmpi is not in your library path
mpi_cxx is called something else on MacOS (on my machine there is a file called libmpi_cxx.so)
body:
@kevinlu1211 I'm not familiar with MacOS but it looks like one of the following is the problem:

1. openmpi is not installed on your machine
2. openmpi is not in your library path
3. mpi_cxx is called something else on MacOS (on my machine there is a file called libmpi_cxx.so)
